title: Stay On The Potter's Wheel | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Stay On The Potter's Wheel | Joel Osteen
description:
God uses the uncomfortable parts of our lives to prepare us for promotion. He wants to refine your character so that you’ll be ready to receive His blessings. Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
